ocean.question: I'm big and blue, and fish swim through. What am I?
I have a shell and crawl on the sand. I'm very slow. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 I carry my house on my back.
🐌 I am not as fast as a bunny.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea. I can squirt ink. What am I?

hints.text: 🟣 I am a type of sea animal.
🎱 I have more arms than you.

ocean.question: I'm a big fish with sharp teeth, some people are scared of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦷 I have many rows of teeth.

ocean.question: I'm a colourful fish that lives in coral reefs, what am I?
I am a very large mammal that lives in the ocean and sings songs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am bigger than a dolphin.
🌊 I breathe air but live in the ocean.

ocean.question: I am a star shaped creature that lives on the sea bed. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I have points like a star.
🖐 I have five arms in many cases.
🌊 I am often found near coral reefs.

ocean.question: I am a long, slippery fish that hides in rocks. I have no scales. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I look a bit like a snake.
🪨 I like to hide in small spaces.
🚫 I do not have a body covering found on other fish.

ocean.question: I have a long pointy nose like a sword and I swim very fast. What am I?

hints.text: ⚔️ My nose looks like a weapon.

ocean.question: I am a creature that looks like a plant, but I'm an animal with stinging cells. What am I?

hints.text: 🪴 I might look like I am a plant, but I am not.
🤕 I can sting you if you touch me.

food.question: I am yellow and you peel me. Monkeys like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: ️ Koorid mu nahka enne, kui mind sööd.

food.question: I am round and red. You can eat me raw or use me to make sauce. What am I?

hints.text: ❤️ Pizza ja ketšup on tehtud minust.

food.question: I am long and orange. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: Bugs Bunny sööb mind kogu aeg.
Kasvatan maa all ja olen tavaliselt sirge.

food.question: I am white or brown and baked in the oven. You can spread butter on me. What am I?
I am a drink that comes from a cow. I can be white or chocolate. What am I?

hints.text: Sa võid mind teravilja peale valada.
Mind võib maitsestada šokolaadi või maasikatega.

food.question: I am small and green. I grow in a pod. I am good for you. What am I?

hints.text: Popeye sööb palju minusuguseid rohelisi köögivilju.

food.question: I am made of frozen cream and sugar. I come in many flavors. What am I?
I am a fruit with a fuzzy skin. I'm sweet and green inside. What am I?

hints.text: Mul on pruun ja udune nahk.

food.question: I am made from ground-up nuts and I'm spread on bread. What am I?

hints.text: Karud armastavad pähkleid, aga ma ei ole tegelik pähkel.
Mõned inimesed on minu suhtes allergilised.

food.question: I am a small, round berry that is often dried and used in muffins. What am I?

hints.text: Mind võib leida pannkookidest ja muffinitest.
Olen tavaliselt sinise või lilla värviga.
